document.full_text: japan expects to stop pumping radioactive water into the sea from a crippled nuclear plant on saturday, a day after china expressed concern at the action, reflecting growing international unease at the month-long nuclear crisis.
document.title: japan to stop pumping radioactive water into sea
lines_and_colors: japan expects to stop pumping radioactive water into the sea from a crippled nuclear plant on saturday, a day after china expressed concern at the action, reflecting growing international unease at the month-long nuclear crisis.
